name: Netrun 2000
overview: Deep in space, on the edge of the Empire, the remote border outpost, Netrun 2000 is under attack! Wave upon wave of hostile forces threaten to overwhelm you and destroy the twin gun emplacement, you last stand of resistance. All it takes is one direct hit on the barrier and your defences will crumble... only you stand between your attackers and the fall of an empire!
